1.title: Alex & Paige
1.plot: Paige was on her way to becoming a nurse; Alex had a thriving pet grooming business with aspirations of expansion. While recreationally using drugs, the two met at a party and have been together ever since. With regular and escalating addictions, Alex finds himself at risk of going to jail for possession while Paige is on the verge of an overdose. Alex's mom, Denise, is at her wits' end from trying to manage Alex's business and her own corrosive relationship with her son. She reaches out to Kristina who must break the codependent cycle in both families to save the ...

2.title: Gianluca & Caitlyn
2.plot: Gianluca was a clean-cut surfer from a tight knit Italian family. Caitlyn was an aspiring hair stylist though she suffered from a congenital heart disorder that required a pacemaker. A few weeks into their year long relationship, the couple had full-blown heroin addictions. They were able to maintain the appearance of a normal relationship with their nice apartment and good looks but, with the threat of eviction looming, their facade is beginning to crumble. Caitlyn's mom, Sarah, reaches out to Kristina to save them from losing everything - including Caitlyn's life. ...

3.title: Eric & Amy
3.plot: Amy was an aspiring model and devoted mother. Eric had a big family, made a six-figure salary and was a role model to his two young sons. Five years ago, they met online and have been inseparable ever since. But their addiction to heroin, meth and each other has been disastrous. They've lost their homes, careers and families and now live out of seedy motels, barely making enough money to score drugs and keep a roof over their heads. To make what little money they have, Amy has resorted to prostitution, a fact she keeps secret from her family, and Eric shoplifts. ...

4.title: Kristen & Spencer
4.plot: Spencer's world turned upside down when his mother died in a motorcycle accident when he was ten years old. Instead of dealing with the lingering pain and loss, Spencer turned to drugs: heroin and meth. Krysten is every parent's worst nightmare. Her parents provided the best upbringing possible, but addiction happened anyway. Krysten's mother, Joanne, is desperate for her daughter and Spencer to return to the sober couple she remembers from two years ago and so enlists the help of Kristina. In order for these families to save their children, Kristina urges them to put...

5.title: Louis & Dan
5.plot: Dan was abandoned by his father as a young boy and essentially raised himself. Louis grew up with a single mother after his father died. Louis and his mother depended on one another for everything, including emotional support as he became the main focus of her life. Louis and Dan met online 10 years ago. Friends at first, they decided to take their relationship to the next level, married shortly after and have been inseparable ever since. But their traumatic pasts continued to haunt them leading to a mutual obsession with alcohol, pills, hard drugs and chaos. Louis's ...

imdb.plot outline: What happens when the hand that reaches out to comfort is the same hand around their lover's throat? At the families' request, renowned family interventionist, Kristina Wandzilak, uses her experience as a recovering addict to help couples whose toxic love is intensified by their downward spiral into drug addiction. Viewers will have a front row seat as these couples struggle with their demons and fight for a better future. Sorting through their corrosive interpersonal relations with family, friends, and their lovers, Kristina devises a treatment plan which includes intervention, rehabilitation, and long term recovery. But can the couples summon the willpower to conquer their addictions?
imdb.title: Codependent
plot: Renowned family interventionist, Kristina Wandzilak, uses her experience as a recovering addict to help couples whose toxic love is intensified by their downward spiral into drug addiction.

What happens when the hand that reaches out to comfort is the same hand around their lover's throat? At the families' request, renowned family interventionist, Kristina Wandzilak, uses her experience as a recovering addict to help couples whose toxic love is intensified by their downward spiral into drug addiction. Viewers will have a front row seat as these couples struggle with their demons and fight for a better future. Sorting through their corrosive interpersonal relations with family, friends, and their lovers, Kristina devises a treatment plan which includes intervention, rehabilitation, and long term recovery. But can the couples summon the willpower to conquer their addictions?
